column1: #text=Today I decided to go to the library and borrow a book to read .
#text=The library is my local public library , and it is very big so there are many options to choose from .
#text=When I arrived , I began walking up and down the aisles , reading the titles on the books and looking at ones that had titles that caught my eye .
#text=I made my way through the fiction section , as this is what I prefer to read .
#text=I perused many genres , including fantasy , horror , thriller , and mystery .
#text=I finally settled on a book by Stephen King - arguably one of the best horror writers of all-time .
#text=It was a book I had read before , but I enjoyed it enough to read again .
#text=After making my selection , I made my way to the self-scanner to check out my book .
#text=I scanned my library card so that the book would be logged under my account , then I scanned the book itself .
#text=I left the library and went home to sit down and read .
